eclasstool.model.presentation

Class Presentation

  • java.lang.Object
    • eclasstool.model.presentation.Presentation

  • public class Presentation
extends java.lang.Object
    The Presentation object is derived from the main view of Sections 2.2 and 2.3 of the requirements.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int currentSlide
      Index of current active slide being shown
      private java.util.ArrayList<Slide> slides
      Consists of all the slides in presentation
      private java.lang.String title
      Title of specific presentation file user is viewing

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Presentation()
      Presentation with a title and the list of slides.

      Edits current slide from the slides collection in the LectureEditor window.
